Home > external > combineMetaCycKEGGModels.m

combineMetaCycKEGGModels

PURPOSE

combineMetaCycKEGGModels

SYNOPSIS

function model=combineMetaCycKEGGModels(metacycModel,keggModel)

DESCRIPTION 

 combineMetaCycKEGGModels
   Combine MetaCyc and KEGG draft models into one model structure.

   model     a model structure generated by integrating information
             from draft models reconstructed using MetaCyc and KEGG
             databases. The 'rxnFrom/metFrom/geneFrom' fields are
             included to indicate the source.

   Usage: model=combineMetaCycKEGGModels(metacycModel,keggModel)

   Simonas Marcisauskas, 2018-03-17

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
This function is called by:

0001 function model=combineMetaCycKEGGModels(metacycModel,keggModel)
0002 % combineMetaCycKEGGModels
0003 %   Combine MetaCyc and KEGG draft models into one model structure.
0004 %
0005 %   model     a model structure generated by integrating information
0006 %             from draft models reconstructed using MetaCyc and KEGG
0007 %             databases. The 'rxnFrom/metFrom/geneFrom' fields are
0008 %             included to indicate the source.
0009 %
0010 %   Usage: model=combineMetaCycKEGGModels(metacycModel,keggModel)
0011 %
0012 %   Simonas Marcisauskas, 2018-03-17

0015 %Just return the model
0016 if nargin<2
0017     disp('Missing input model');
0018     return;
0019 end
0020 
0021 %Add MetaCyc model as template
0022 model=metacycModel;
0023 model.id='COMBINED';
0024 model.description='Combined model from MetaCyc and KEGG draft models';
0025 
0026 %Use MetaCyc model as template
0027 model.rxnFrom=cell(numel(model.rxns),1);
0028 model.rxnFrom(:)={'MetaCyc'};
0029 model.metFrom=cell(numel(model.mets),1);
0030 model.metFrom(:)={'MetaCyc'};
0031 model.geneFrom=cell(numel(model.genes),1);
0032 model.geneFrom(:)={'MetaCyc'};
0033 model.grRulesKEGG=cell(numel(model.rxns),1);
0034 model.grRulesKEGG(:)={''};
0035 
0036 %Remove the S and rxnGeneMat matrix
0037 if isfield(model,'S')
0038     model=rmfield(model,'S');
0039 end
0040 if isfield(model,'rxnGeneMat')
0041     model=rmfield(model,'rxnGeneMat');
0042 end
0043 
0044 %Arrange the genes related fields
0045 
0046 %Shared genes between KEGG and MetaCyc
0047 sharedGenes=intersect(keggModel.genes,model.genes);
0048 [a, b]=ismember(sharedGenes,model.genes);
0049 model.geneFrom(b)={'Both'};
0050 
0051 %Add unique genes from KEGG and update geneFrom
0052 C=setdiff(keggModel.genes,model.genes);
0053 model.genes=[model.genes;C];
0054 geneFrom=cell(numel(C),1);
0055 geneFrom(:)={'KEGG'};
0056 model.geneFrom=[model.geneFrom;geneFrom];
0057 
0058 %Prepare for matching grRules
0059 if isfield(keggModel,'grRules');
0060     keggModel.grRules=strrep(keggModel.grRules,'(','');
0061     keggModel.grRules=strrep(keggModel.grRules,')','');
0062 end
0063 
0064 %Replace rxns in KEGG model with the corresponding ones in MetaCyc. by
0065 %updating values rxns field to MetaCyc version whenever possible.
0066 
0067 %Collect the ones found in MetaCyc as mappedRxns
0068 mappedRxns=[];
0069 rxnsToMove=[];
0070 grRulesToMove={}; %Storing the grRules to be moved to metacyc model
0071 
0072 %Read in dbLinks, note that linkMetaCycKEGGRxns need to be run in advance
0073 load('metaCycRxns.mat');
0074 num=0;
0075 numToMove=0;
0076 %Loop through the KEGG model and replace the rxn id from KEGG to MetaCyc
0077 %version
0078 for i=1:numel(keggModel.rxns)
0079     [a, b]=ismember(rxnLinks.kegg,keggModel.rxns{i});
0080     I=find(b);
0081     
0082     if numel(I)==1
0083         %Find out the corresponding MetaCyc reactions
0084         num=num+1;
0085         %Record the mapped rxn index in kegg model and remove them later
0086         mappedRxns=[mappedRxns,i];
0087         %keggModel.rxns{i}=rxnLinks.metacyc{I(1)};
0088         
0089         [c, d]=ismember(rxnLinks.metacyc{I(1)},model.rxns);
0090         if c
0091             model.rxnFrom{d}='Both';
0092             %Combine the grRule info Check if kegg grRules equals or a
0093             %subset of metacyc grRules If not, save the kegg grRules to a
0094             %new field grRulesKEGG for manual curation
0095             k=strfind(model.grRules{d},keggModel.grRules{i});
0096             if isempty(k)
0097                 if isempty(model.grRulesKEGG{d})
0098                     model.grRulesKEGG{d}=keggModel.grRules{i};
0099                 else
0100                     model.grRulesKEGG{d}=strcat(model.grRulesKEGG{d},{' or '},keggModel.grRules{i});
0101                 end
0102             end
0103         else
0104             %For the KEGG rxns have MetaCyc version but not in MetaCyc
0105             %draft model
0106             [x, y]=ismember(rxnLinks.metacyc{I(1)},metaCycRxns.rxns);
0107             
0108             %Check if this reaction is repitetive and save the grRules
0109             [Repeat, Index]=ismember(y,rxnsToMove);
0110             if ~Repeat
0111                 rxnsToMove=[rxnsToMove;y];  %Record rxns to be moved from kegg to metacyc model
0112                 grRulesToMove=[grRulesToMove;keggModel.grRules{i}];
0113                 numToMove=numToMove+1;
0114             else
0115                 %If this reaction has been recorded, append the grRules if
0116                 %it is different
0117                 k=strfind(grRulesToMove{Index},keggModel.grRules{i});
0118                 if isempty(k)
0119                     grRulesToMove{Index}=strcat(grRulesToMove{Index},{' or '},keggModel.grRules{i});
0120                 end
0121             end
0122         end
0123     else
0124         %Here are the case of one kegg rxn id link to several MetaCyc ids
0125         %for j=2:numel(I) Ignore this issue for now, and resolve it later,
0126         %because it never happened This case can be solved by adding above
0127         %section into a loop below disp(I(j)); end
0128     end
0129 end
0130 fprintf('NOTE: A total of %d reactions in the KEGG model were mapped to MetaCyc.\n',num);
0131 fprintf('NOTE: %d reactions already in MetaCyc model, %d will be combined.\n',num-numToMove,numToMove);
0132 
0133 %Append mapped metacyc rxns in kegg model that are absent from metacyc
0134 %model
0135 rxnFrom=cell(numel(rxnsToMove),1);
0136 rxnFrom(:)={'KEGG'};
0137 model.rxnFrom=[model.rxnFrom;rxnFrom];
0138 model.rxns=[model.rxns;metaCycRxns.rxns(rxnsToMove)];
0139 
0140 rxnNames=metaCycRxns.rxnNames(rxnsToMove);
0141 %Replace rxnNames with those from metaCycEnzymes
0142 load('metaCycEnzymes.mat');
0143 for i=1:numel(rxnsToMove)
0144     [a, b]=ismember(metaCycRxns.rxns{rxnsToMove(i)},metaCycEnzymes.rxns);
0145     if a
0146         rxnNames{i}=metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{b};
0147     end
0148 end
0149 model.rxnNames=[model.rxnNames;rxnNames];

0195

0198 rxnFrom(:)={'KEGG'};
